name: Barbarians Adventure in a Fantasy World
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The man prayed every night to every god in existence. He begged that, upon waking the next day, he would find himself in the middle of a wondrous fantasy.One day, his prayer was finally answered. Yet it took a shape that was nothing like what he had wished for.Original Webtoon: KakaoPage, Daum
